name: Pit of Despair
description:
This is the result of a 22-hr game jam, done at the end of the 1st year of school.  The theme was "shatter", so we made the Pit of Despair!  Use a USB controller to aim and shoot at targets, but the recoil moves you, so beware the cliffs of hellish ice and random objects!  Shoot the targets for a higher score!  How long can you last in the Pit of Despair?
